text: Davide Torosantucci (born 3 November 1981 in Lanciano) is an Italian former cyclist. ==Palmares== ;2003 :3rd GP Capodarco :3rd Gara Ciclistica Montappone ;2005 :1st Trofeo Internazionale Bastianelli :1st Gara Ciclistica Montappone ;2008 :1st Overall Grand Prix Cycliste de Gemenc ::1st Prologue ;2009 :1st Overall Tour de Serbie ;2011 :1st Stage 4 Tour of South Africa ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists
title: Davide Torosantucci
